Title: Yuukan Club
Description: ['St. President school is one of the most wealthy schools around. Everybody in that school respects the Yukan club, the most popular and richest group in the school. This includes Shouchikubai Miroku, Kenbishi Yuuri, Kikumasamune Seishirou, Hakushika Noriko and Kizakura Karen. They go through dangerous adventures to save their school, and of course, just to kill their spare time.']
Related: ['Side story: Mahou no Tenshi Creamy Mami', 'Prequel: Mahou no Tenshi Creamy Mami: Lovely Serenade']
Characters: ['Kikumasamune, Seishirou', 'Kizakura, Karen', 'Hakushika, Noriko', 'Granmarie, Bidou', 'Shochikubai, Miroku', 'Kenbishi, Yuuri', 'Shochikubai, Tokimune', 'Buddihst Priest', 'Brother', 'Godai']
